title.narrative: Cooperation with China on Ensuring Trade in Legal Timber Products & Reducing Deforestation in Developing Countries

description.narrative: This activity (Cooperation with China on Ensuring Trade in Legal Timber Products & Reducing Deforestation in Developing Countries) is a component of Forest Governance, Markets and Climate reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £8,233,649. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Forestry policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: LTS International Ltd. The start date is 01-11-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Forestry - Economic Affairs - Forestry - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2014 Quarter 2
